invariants.name: RevokedClientsWillBeDisconnected

returnStmt.pyExpr: all([documentId in documentService.permissions and userId in documentService.permissions[documentId] for documentId, userId in messageProxyService.connections])

expr.pyExpr: all([documentId in documentService.permissions and userId in documentService.permissions[documentId] for documentId, userId in messageProxyService.connections])

branches.condition: documentId in self.permissions and userId in self.permissions[documentId]

conditionExpr.pyExpr: documentId in self.permissions and userId in self.permissions[documentId]

returnStmt.pyExpr: documentId in self.permissions and userId in self.permissions[documentId]

expr.pyExpr: documentId in self.permissions and userId in self.permissions[documentId]

frontMatter.yaml:

deadlock_detection: false
